title: Flyway Migration Best Practices
question: You need to add a 'completed_at' timestamp column to the tasks table. The V3__create_tasks.sql migration has already been applied. What should you do?

options.text: Edit V3__create_tasks.sql to add the column
Delete the flyway_schema_history table and re-run all migrations
Add the column directly to the entity and let Hibernate update the schema
